_88github_com-brainicorn-skelp-skelplate.title: MultiValue allows the user to enter multiple values.

___min.title: Min the minimum value (for numbers) or length (for strings).

___name.description:
The name can be a golang template and can use values gathered from previous
variables in the variables array.
___name.title: Name is the name of the variable.

___mutlival.title: IsMultiVal designates the variable as a mutli-value prompt.

___password.title: Password is a flag to turn on input masking for hiding passwords

___max.title: Max the maximum value (for numbers) or length (for strings)

___addPrompt.title: AddPrompt is the string to display when asking if another value should be entered.

___required.title: Required whether or not a non-empty value is required.

___default.title: Default the default value (can be blank).

___prompt.title: Prompt the string to display when asking for a value.

_88github_com-brainicorn-skelp-skelplate.description: The user can choose multiple values or be restricted to choosing a single value.
